name: Ford
description: A shallow crossing point in a river provides essential transportation routes, while creating strategic chokepoints for military control. The ford allows safe passage for travelers and livestock, while the strategic importance makes it a target for bandits or military forces.
atmosphere: Shallow stone bottom allows safe river crossing while steady current flows around travelers' legs. Strategic location makes this a natural control point for trade and military movement. The air carries fresh water and muddy banks. Well-worn paths lead to and from the crossing point.
